answers.answer: call your doctors ! Those are signs of preclampsia !!!
Agree with lenox_mommy. Call now...don't wait until the morning.
You most definitely need to call your doctor/hospital. You need to be checked out as soon as possible given your symptoms. Don't wait, go ahead and call.
Get to the ER now! That sounds like preclampsia, which is life threatening!
Hope you called the doctor, and are off to the er?
Update?? I hope you went to the hospital and are feeling better soon!
I had  preclampsia and it's very serious! Please keep us updated i had an emergency c section due to this because the doctor thought i might have seizures pushing him out

Thank you ladies. They said I was dehydrated and my body was holding on to any fluid it could. They got the contractions to stop, but they are keeping me because I'm at risk for preeclampsia just like you ladies said. My pressure was through the roof and there was so much protein in my urine. Just waiting for the rest of the tests to come back.
Glad you got to the Dr and updated us! Take care

question: My legs, face, hands, and feet are swelling up so bad and now my feet are numb. Not to mention I'm having the worst contractions ever and sharp cramps in my back and hips and my head is pounding. I'm 32wks+3 and I'm freaking out!!! I've never experienced anything like this with my other pregnancies.
title: ADVICE PLEASE!!!!
